articles.title: Thunder-Pacers: 5 takeaways as Shai Gilgeous-Alexander carries OKC to victory in Game 4
articles.description: Kia NBA MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander comes alive down the stretch to rally Oklahoma City past Indiana in Game 4.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS — The Indiana Pacers made all the right plays, had Oklahoma City on the ropes, prepared to finish the job, and then the dark clouds appeared from nowhere and Indy fell victim to this atmospheric shift in the forecast: A Thunderstorm.

articles.title: BRP Teresa Magbanua arrives in Japan for trilateral exercise
articles.description: The flagship vessel of the Philippine Coast Guard (PCG), BRP Teresa Magbanua (MRRV-9701), has arrived in Japan to participate in the second trilateral maritime...
articles.content:
BRP Teresa Magbanua (MRRV-9701) and her crew arrive in Kagoshima, Japan on June 12, 2025 for the second trilateral exercise among the Philippine Coast Guard (PCG), United States Coast Guard (USCG), and Japan Coast Guard (JCG). (Photo: PCG)

articles.title: Webb space telescope reveals starburst galaxies that lit up the early universe
articles.description: Data from NASA's James Webb Space Telescope has revealed dozens of small galaxies that played a starring role in a cosmic makeover that transformed the early universe into the one we know today.
articles.content:
Astronomers using data from NASA's James Webb Space Telescope have identified dozens of small galaxies that played a starring role in a cosmic makeover that transformed the early universe into the one we know today.

articles.title: The Bee Guy: We're going global for bees
articles.description: With the aim of sharing their methods for supporting bees with the world, Paul Handrick and family are expanding the mission of their bee sanctuary.
articles.content:
THIRTEEN. AN UNLUCKY number to most, but maybe a lucky number for bees and the planet?
Why? I hear you ask.
You see, 13 years ago we bought a farm in a small village on the Wicklow/Wexford border. A small farm with a big view down a long lane, not wi... [6379 chars]

articles.title: M&S ‘praying for sun’ but full recovery from cyber-attack unlikely this summer
articles.description: Shoppers report low availability as retailer prioritises clothing in partial resumption of online services
articles.content:
The bosses at Marks & Spencer will surely be praying for sun.
As UK temperatures rise over the coming week, M&S will be hoping it prompts shoppers to fill their virtual baskets with shorts, swimwear and sandals to get its summer sales back on track.

articles.title: Police dog who 'gave everything' needs £14k surgery
articles.description: PD Coty, who retired from Kent Police in 2024, needs major surgery to maintain movement in her legs.
articles.content:
A retired police dog commended for her bravery will need a critical spinal surgery costing £14,000 to stop her losing all mobility, an animal charity says.
Former Kent Police dog Coty, who served for nearly four years, was involved in numerous operat... [385 chars]

articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: FIA suspends race steward Derek Warwick for media comments
articles.description: Former driver Derek Warwick is suspended from his role as a steward at this weekend's Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Warwick won the Le Mans 24 Hours, is a former president of the British Racing Drivers' Club and is one of the most senior driver stewards in F1.
An ex-F1 driver is always one of the four stewards officiating at every grand prix.
Last week Warwick was... [1528 chars]

articles.title: Karisma Kapoor's ex Sunjay Kapur’s funeral to be held in Delhi, but legal hurdle in getting body back to India: Report
articles.description: Industrialist Sunjay Kapur’s funeral may face delays due to legal formalities involving his US citizenship. | Bollywood
articles.content: Industrialist Sunjay Kapur, the ex-husband of actor Karisma Kapoor, died in London on Thursday. According to a new report, his funeral might be delayed due to legal formalities, as he was a US citizen. Also read: Who was Sunjay Kapur? Prince William'... [1879 chars]
